title: How do I send data using Bluetooth?
answer:
To share an audio clip, a picture, or a video, touch and hold the file in Music or Gallery, and touch Share then Bluetooth to send the file. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112777)

 To share a website, open your browser, access the website, and touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Share page. In the displayed dialog box, touch Bluetooth. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112778)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112779)

 To share contacts, go to Contacts and touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Import/Export > Share contacts. Select the contacts you want to share, and touch SHARE then Bluetooth. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112780) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112781) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112782)
